feed.title: Smart Mechatronics Engineering | News
feed.subtitle: Stay updated on the activities of the Research Group Smart Mechatronics Engineering

entry.title: Pasquariello Ieee Access
entry.content: Our joint article “Model-Based Systems Engineering for Digital Twin System Development Applied to an Aircraft Seat Test Bench” by Pasquariello A., Bouhali I., Leherbauer D., Abdeljabbar N., Mhenni F., Patalano S., Hehenberger P. and Rega A. appeared in IEEE Access (Volume 13). Read the open-access paper via its DOI.
entry.summary: Our joint article “Model-Based Systems Engineering for Digital Twin System Development Applied to an Aircraft Seat Test Bench” by Pasquariello A., Bouhali I., Leherbauer D., Abdeljabbar N., Mhenni F., Patalano S., Hehenberger P. and Rega A. appeared in IEEE Access (Volume 13). Read the open-access paper via its DOI.

entry.title: Leherbauer Lce 2025
entry.content: Leherbauer D., Wagner E., Kneidinger C. and Hehenberger P. presented “Model-based Electricity Consumption Quantification of Polymer Extruders for Mechanical Recycling Applications” at the 32nd CIRP Conference on Life Cycle Engineering (LCE 2025) in Manchester, UK, advancing our research on sustainable manufacturing.
entry.summary: Leherbauer D., Wagner E., Kneidinger C. and Hehenberger P. presented “Model-based Electricity Consumption Quantification of Polymer Extruders for Mechanical Recycling Applications” at the 32nd CIRP Conference on Life Cycle Engineering (LCE 2025) in Manchester, UK, advancing our research on sustainable manufacturing.

entry.title: Schmid Cirp Design
entry.content: Schmid D., Merschak S., Lack S. and Hehenberger P. shared “Towards a framework for automatic disassembly supporting circular economy” at the 35th CIRP Design Conference 2025 in Patras, Greece, outlining our latest concepts for circular product lifecycles.
entry.summary: Schmid D., Merschak S., Lack S. and Hehenberger P. shared “Towards a framework for automatic disassembly supporting circular economy” at the 35th CIRP Design Conference 2025 in Patras, Greece, outlining our latest concepts for circular product lifecycles.

entry.title: Rser Article Online
entry.content: 🚀 Exciting News! Our latest research “Demand-side management in less energy-intensive industries: A systematic mapping study” authored by Dominik and Peter has just been published in the highly renowned journal Renewable and Sustainable Energy Reviews (16.3 IF, 97% percentile) 🌍⚡
entry.summary: 🚀 Exciting News! Our latest research “Demand-side management in less energy-intensive industries: A systematic mapping study” authored by Dominik and Peter has just been published in the highly renowned journal Renewable and Sustainable Energy Reviews (16.3 IF, 97% percentile) 🌍⚡

entry.title: Keynote Supmeca
entry.content: Peter gave a keynote speech about “Sustainability from a Mechatronics Viewpoint: Theoretical Background and selected Applications” at Séminaires Quartz, ISEA Supmeca Paris
entry.summary: Peter gave a keynote speech about “Sustainability from a Mechatronics Viewpoint: Theoretical Background and selected Applications” at Séminaires Quartz, ISEA Supmeca Paris

entry.title: Industry 5.0 Workshop
entry.content: We organized a workshop on “Industry 5.0: New challenges and opportunities” at the “3. Tag der agilen Transformation“
entry.summary: We organized a workshop on “Industry 5.0: New challenges and opportunities” at the “3. Tag der agilen Transformation“

entry.title: Fachtagung Kreislaufwirtschaft
entry.content: Simon and Peter presented our work regarding “Life Cycle Assessment” at Fachtagung Kreislaufwirtschaft
entry.summary: Simon and Peter presented our work regarding “Life Cycle Assessment” at Fachtagung Kreislaufwirtschaft

entry.title: Sustainability Article Online
entry.content: Our new article from Dominik and Peter has been published in the journal Sustainability :seedling:. Have a look here

entry.title: Peter Keynote
entry.content: Peter is member of the International Program Committee of the 22nd International Conference on Research and Education in Mechatronics (REM 2024) in Jordan. We organized the conference 2019 in Wels.
entry.summary: Peter is member of the International Program Committee of the 22nd International Conference on Research and Education in Mechatronics (REM 2024) in Jordan. We organized the conference 2019 in Wels.
